name: us_license_plate_to_vin
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vin_decoder.
Tool description: This VIN decoder covers up to 168 fields for the USA and Canada. It also includes VIN lookup by US license plate and state. The database is updated regularly. 
[View documents](https://rapidapi.com/dominonet-lTpEE6zONeS/api/vin-decoder19/details)
API description: Converts a U.S. state license plate number to a Vehicle Identification Number (VIN).

state_code.description:
**Run a License Plate Search By State**
AL,AK,AZ,AR,CA,CO,CT,DE,DC,FL,GA,HI,ID,IL,IN,IA,KS,KY,LA,ME,MD,MA,MI,MN,MS,MO,MT,NE,NV,NH,NJ,NM,NY,NC,ND,OH,OK,OR,PA,RI,SC,SD,TN,TX,UT,VT,VA,WA,WV,WI,WY

license_plate.description: The license plate number for which to find the VIN.
